title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/rentalscam_richard.html
notes:
Scamorama proudly welcomes the wizard who is 'Hanna Selvbedrag'.
This is really something.
'Hanna'  responded to a scammer's 'rental' ad - and convinced him that she was ANOTHER scammer.
Read and marvel at her technique. Learn how scammers talk.

messages.body:
richard.willms202@yahoo.com



	
Fra: Richard Williams
Emne: Full details and pictures of apt in 

This beautiful 3bdrm, 2 bath, 1 car garage is loaded with amenities: my flat is located at............4 Effie road fulham Broadway London sw6 1ad...

Am working professionals and work early and sometimes long hours.....
 
My flat is not a shared apt, it depends if you want the whole flat or a single room. there are storage in my flat...2mins to Chelsea stadium(Stanford bridge)2min by car to fulham Broadway station, and 4 min walk to the tube station..., Banks and supermarket are close to my flat...the price of the room include all bills and utilities.....

My house include.... 
* cable,
* garage, with ample storage!!! 
* washer/dryer, All appliances including refrigerator, d/w, oven, washer,anddryer 
* water softener system,
* new appliances
(refrigerator, stove, microwave,disposal),
* new central heating system,
* Brand new air conditioning system installed in all rooms
* shaded patio with a fire pit;
* Internet cables in all the rooms
* quiet private road.

Would prefer clean, professional individual (male/female; gay/straight/bi;republican/democrat/libertarian friendly) who is considerate and responsible.

N.B NOTE.
IF YOU ARE RENTING A SINGLE ROOM AMOUNT PER MONTH IS 350 GBP AND SECURITY DEPOSIT IS 300,THE WHOLE FLAT IS 800 GBP PER MONTH WITH SECURITY DEPOSIT OF 600,SECURITY DEPOSIT IS REFUNDABLE AT YOUR EXIT.
 
Looking forward to read from you,
Number 07045792485
 
Richard.
messages.raw:
Richard Williams

richard.willms202@yahoo.com

messages.body:
Hello Hanna,
    i can see you are serious about my apt, thats why i want to rent the flat out to you....Definitely you can view it anytime but i am presently in Manchester now .Am just been transfer to Manchester now for some business,i need to be sure that you are capable of getting the apartment before i can come to London to show you the apt, imagine a girl ask me to come from Manchester to London that she want to rent the apartment i left to meet her on getting there she told me that she want to rent the apartment but i should allow her to stay till the end of the month b4 she can pay me and the other is on dss....Can you see that bullshit,i need to see a sign that you are capable and you have the money before i can come for the viewing  of the apt.... am very sure that you will like the apartment. i cant be stressing myself when am not sure that you are capable.The apartment is available now and you can move in at anytime.
Hear from you soon,

Richard.

messages.body:
Emne: My passport attached below...  

Hello Hanna,
     The only way for me to confirm that you are capable of renting the apt is for you to get the first month rent and the security deposit send to me via western union money transfer to your friend or anybody that you trust within London here , and scan the receipt for me to see to and confirm from western union and after i confirm it,i will email you to tell the receiver to pick it up and i will be on my way too ,then i will be sure that you have the money to get the apartment. Its for the safety of both parties but am very sure that you will like the apartment. I am NOT asking you to send money to me but to anybody that you trust .ONCE BEATEN TWICE SHY ,I think you understand my position.

      The charges that you make at western union will be refunded back to you if you dont like the apartment and if you like the apartment
the money will be deducted from the balance you will pay me,i think you understand.
   If you can do this Today or tomorrow and i see the receipt send to me,that means you will view the apartment tomorrow even you can move in tomorrow.

  i am NOT asking you to send money to me, but to your friend/Girl Friend or any body that you trust within uk here.  Afterward you will only scan and send me a copy of the receipt given at the western union for me to confirm and to see if the money is truly transfer and ready for pickup then once i can see that will email you immedietely and give you a call and leave Manchester for London to meet you and to show you in and out of the apartment.









N.B.
     Am very sorry, but i dont want to waste my time due to my last experience..... and my lawyer told me again that i need to confirm that the money is available for pick up before i come over......I promise once
again even if you dont like the room, i will refund the western union charges and i will give you your transport money.... Please get the money send to me today or tomorrow and send me the receipt again.....

Awaiting your response,
Try my number 07045792485 

Richard.

Richard Williams

N.B.
Am very sorry, but i dont want to waste my time due to my last experience..... and my lawyer told me again that i need to confirm that the money is available for pick up before i come over......I promise once again even if you dont like the room, i will refund the western union charges and i will give you your transport money.... Please get the money send to me today or tomorrow and send me the receipt again.....

Awaiting your response,
Try my number 07045792485 [UK mobile phone but could forward anywhere]

Richard.

messages.body:
Richard,

Oh bed sheets? My favourite is white, as I believe white is the colour of purity and innocence, and I am a good Christian girl who does not want the bed to symolize anything not pure. I am sure you understand. 

But please Richard, why can you not just give me your bank account number? I am more than happy to pay the security deposit (600 punds) right away, but I don't know anyone I trust in London so I can't use moneygram after all. Is that ok? 

Also, I would like to see a picture of the house from the outside. I know some of the houses in that area, and they are a bit ugly on the outside. I would like a nice house. 

God bless,
Hanna
